QUERY_CACHE.scenario: Can I get all accounts in the Miami city?
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.KY_BA IN (SELECT KY_BA FROM CSADM.BB_AUTO_SIGN_UP) AND CSADM.V_SAD.AD_SERV_CITY LIKE '%MIAMI%'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: Give me a customer details for rate code 44
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.KY_BA IN (SELECT KY_BA FROM CSADM.BB_AUTO_SIGN_UP) AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_TAR_SCH=44

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active electric account on rate (2/68) active on budget bill with a BB deferred balance greater than zero
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD, CSADM.BUS_BB_ACT WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.KY_BA IN (SELECT KY_BA FROM CSADM.BB_AUTO_SIGN_UP) AND CSADM.V_SAD.KY_BA=CSADM.BUS_BB_ACT.KY_BA AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_TAR_SCH=68 AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_ACCT_TYPE=33 AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND CSADM.BUS_BB_ACT.AT_BB_DEFR_BA>0

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want premise numbers that have an active AMI electric meter with C route
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT CRADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FROM CRADM.V_SAD WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_MTR_BILL_GRP IN ('1','2','4','11','13','19','20','21') AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT='2' AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM='AC'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want premise numbers that have an active AMI NET electric meter with C route
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT CRADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FROM CRADM.V_SAD WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_MTR_BILL_GRP IN ('1','2','4','11','13','19','20','21') AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT='2' AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM='AC' AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_NO LIKE '%%%%N'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want premise numbers that have an active NON AMI electric meter, ordered by premise number and only the first 500 results
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT CSADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FROM CSADM.V_SAD, CSADM.BILL_ACCT WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.KY_BA = CSADM.BILL_ACCT.KY_BA AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND CSADM.V_SAD.KY_MTR_BILL_GRP IN (1,2,4,11,13,19,20,21) AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1) IN ('2','5','7','4','6') ORDER BY CSADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FETCH FIRST 500 ROWS ONLY

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want premise numbers that have an active AMI Demand meter
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT CRADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FROM CRADM.V_SAD WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_MTR_BILL_GRP IN ('19') AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT='2' AND SUBSTR(CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='K'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want premise numbers that have an active AMI NET Demand meter
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT CRADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FROM CRADM.V_SAD WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_MTR_BILL_GRP IN ('19') AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT='2' AND SUBSTR(CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='K' AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_NO LIKE '%%%%N'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active electric premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_ACCT_TYPE=33

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active electric smart meter

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active demand meter premise

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active smart demand meter premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='K'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active TOU meter premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1) IN ('D','M')

QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='M'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active TOU non smart meter premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='D'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active ELE NON AMI meter premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1) IN ('2','5','7')

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active three phase meter premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,2,1) IN ('J','L','N')

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active BI directional meter premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='B'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active BOLT ON meter premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,2,1)='N'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active electric NET premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_ACCT_TYPE=33 AND (SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_NO,5,1)='N' OR SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_NO,4,1)='N')

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active demand NET meter premise
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1) IN ('6','4') AND (SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_NO,5,1)='N' OR SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_NO,4,1)='N')

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want a premise number that has an active AMI Electric meter with Y route
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT DISTINCT CSADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FROM CSADM.V_SAD,CSADM.METER_ROUTE WHERE CSADM.METER_ROUTE.CD_DIST = CSADM.V_SAD.CD_DIST AND CSADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO > 999999 AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='A' AND CSADM.METER_ROUTE.CD_AMR_RTE IN ('Y')

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want a premise number that has an active AMI Demand meter with Y route
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT DISTINCT CSADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FROM CSADM.V_SAD,CSADM.METER_ROUTE WHERE CSADM.METER_ROUTE.CD_DIST = CSADM.V_SAD.CD_DIST AND CSADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO > 999999 AND CSADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1) IN ('6','4') AND SUBSTR(CSADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='A'AND CSADM.METER_ROUTE.CD_AMR_RTE IN ('Y')

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an account number that has an active Commercial electric type meter
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CRADM.V_SAD, CRADM.BILL_ACCT WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_BA = CRADM.BILL_ACCT.KY_BA AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_REV='2' AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1) IN ('2','5','7') AND CRADM.V_SAD.KY_MTR_BILL_GRP IN (1,2,4,11,13,19,20,21)

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active Residential electric type account number
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CRADM.V_SAD, CRADM.BILL_ACCT WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_BA = CRADM.BILL_ACCT.KY_BA AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_REV='1' AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1) IN ('2','5','7') AND CRADM.V_SAD.KY_MTR_BILL_GRP IN (1,2,4,11,13,19,20,21)

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an inactive account number
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CRADM.V_SAD WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO > 999999 AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=11

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active RCS enabled premise number
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CRADM.V_SAD,CRADM.RCS_PREMISE WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO = CRADM.RCS_PREMISE.KY_PREM_NO AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_NO,1,1)='D' AND CRADM.RCS_PREMISE.CD_RCS_STAT='E'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want an active RCS not enabled premise number
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CRADM.V_SAD,CRADM.RCS_PREMISE WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO = CRADM.RCS_PREMISE.KY_PREM_NO AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND SUBSTR(CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MTR_NO,1,1)='D' AND CRADM.RCS_PREMISE.CD_RCS_STAT NOT IN ('E')

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want premise numbers from active accounts in district 46
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT CRADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO FROM CRADM.V_SAD, CRADM.BILL_ACCT WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_BA=CRADM.BILL_ACCT.KY_BA AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_DIST IN ('46')

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want active Toggle meter accounts
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CRADM.V_SAD,CRADM.BILL_ACCT WHERE CRADM.V_SAD.KY_BA=CRADM.BILL_ACCT.KY_BA AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_SAD_STAT=2 AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_MULT_MTR='M' AND CRADM.V_SAD.CD_ACCT_TYPE IN (57) AND CRADM.V_SAD.KY_MTR_BILL_GRP IN (1,2,4,11,13,19,20,21)

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want active SDR premise number with 5 dial meters and glass cover meter status
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CSADM.V_SAD,CSADM.METER_PT WHERE CSADM.V_SAD.KY_PREM_NO=CSADM.METER_PT.KY_PREM_NO AND CSADM.METER_PT.CD_MTR_STAT='GC' AND CSADM.METER_PT.CD_STAT=2 AND CSADM.METER_PT.QY_NO_OF_DIAL=5 AND CSADM.METER_PT.KY_MPT_NO=1 AND CSADM.METER_PT.CD_MTR_SYM='PV' AND SUBSTR(CSADM.METER_PT.CD_MTR_SYM,1,1)='P' AND CSADM.METER_PT.CD_MPT_TYPE='SDR'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want to find Meter Reading download status orders
QUERY_CACHE.query: SELECT * FROM CRADM.FSOS_MR_TKT_PEND WHERE CRADM.FSOS_MR_TKT_PEND.TX_STATUS LIKE '%DWNLD%'

QUERY_CACHE.scenario: I want active RCS enabled premise numbers with Toggle meters
